txt.en: Khâshap has fled deeper into the Streets of Râhal Bakh. Catch up to him before it is too late.
Khâshap has fled into the bustling Streets of Râhal Bakh where he has the protection of his cohorts.
Khâshap has left his champion Utho to deal with you.
Khâshap at long last has been stopped. The engine of the apothecaries will no longer reach his masters, and the crisis averted.\n\nYou should speak to Hadorion.

'This is it. It's now or never. He has nowhere left to hide.

'But this is also his home turf. We face some tough odds. But I am sure you have faced far worse.

'If he manages to deliver the phial, there's no telling what the consequences may be. Do not stop for anything. Bring him to justice!'
The way is open! Continue your pursuit!
Khâshap continues his escape to another gate. But it seems he is out of options.
The pursuit of Khâshap has led you to a dead end. He has no choice but to take a stand.

'I swear that man had nine lives. Every step of the way he used his minions as shields and would slip off into the night.

'Today was a good day. Not only did we solve the case, but we stopped an even larger plot from manifesting.

'Thank you. I could not have done this without you.'
